price: 81. Dheh: Haddii Raxmaanku (Alle) aad leedihiin wiil (buu leeyahay), waxaan anigu ahay kan u horreeya ee waxida (oo ka hufa inuu leeyahay ilmo ama xaas ama shariig).
arabic: قُلۡ إِن كَانَ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَلَدٞ فَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلۡعَٰبِدِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul in kāna lilrraḥmāni waladun fa-anā awwalu al-ʿābidīna
